statements: SELECT * FROM abandonded_carts;
SELECT cart_id, customer_id, abandoned_date FROM abandonded_carts;
SELECT customer_id, products FROM abandonded_carts;
SELECT cart_id, products, abandoned_date FROM abandonded_carts WHERE follow_up_emails_sent < 3;
SELECT * FROM abandonded_carts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, abandoned_date FROM abandoned_carts WHERE follow_up_emails_sent > 0;
SELECT cart_id, products FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY abandoned_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(abandoned_date) AS latest_abandoned_date, COUNT(*) AS total_abandoned_carts FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(products) AS num_products FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY num_products DESC, abandoned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT cart_id, abandoned_time FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(cart_id) AS total_abandoned_carts FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails ORDER BY email_sent_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_content FROM follow_up_emails WHERE email_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, abandoned_time FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 500 ORDER BY abandoned_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_content FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 200 AND email_sent_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS abandoned_cart_count FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, cart_items FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_items->'$.quantity' > 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT cart_id, user_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, subject FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM follow_up_emails GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_emails DESC;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS cart_count FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT email, full_name FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT subject, body FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_at < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM abandoned_carts WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT cart_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM abandoned_carts WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM recovered_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_status, sent_date FROM targeted_emails WHERE opened = true;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT cart_id, customer_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts WHERE email_sent = FALSE;
SELECT sale_id, total_amount, sale_date FROM sales WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT products.name, products.price, sales.total_amount FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.cart_id
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE email_sent = TRUE ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC
SELECT sales.sale_id, customers.first_name, customers.last_name, sales.total_amount FROM sales INNER JOIN customers ON sales.cart_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT products.category, SUM(sales.total_amount) AS total_sales FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.cart_id GROUP BY products.category
